Label.en: This makes it so that from the front, the beast seems to stand firm and still
Label.fr: This makes it so that from the front, the beast seems to stand firm and still
Label.es: This makes it so that from the front, the beast seems to stand firm and still

Label.en: But from the side, they are walking!
Label.fr: But from the side, they are walking!
Label.es: But from the side, they are walking!

Label.en: It’s a smart piece of design that brings these creatures to life!
Label.fr: It’s a smart piece of design that brings these creatures to life!
Label.es: It’s a smart piece of design that brings these creatures to life!

Label.en: These particular Lamassu were excavated in the palace of Dur Sharrukin between 1840-50, along with many other artefacts!
Label.fr: These particular Lamassu were excavated in the palace of Dur Sharrukin between 1840-50, along with many other artefacts!
Label.es: These particular Lamassu were excavated in the palace of Dur Sharrukin between 1840-50, along with many other artefacts!

Label.en: Nearly all of the excavated treasures were lost! One boat sank in the Tigris river, and the other was hijacked by pirates
Label.fr: Nearly all of the excavated treasures were lost! One boat sank in the Tigris river, and the other was hijacked by pirates
Label.es: Nearly all of the excavated treasures were lost! One boat sank in the Tigris river, and the other was hijacked by pirates

Label.en: I guess Blackbeard had a taste for Ancient Mesopotamian sculpture as well as rum and pieces of eight!
Label.fr: I guess Blackbeard had a taste for Ancient Mesopotamian sculpture as well as rum and pieces of eight!
Label.es: I guess Blackbeard had a taste for Ancient Mesopotamian sculpture as well as rum and pieces of eight!
